column5: We are heading up to Black Sturgeon lake near Kenora in a couple of weeks. We are looking for map of the upper black sturgeon and any help on catching more walleyes during first part of Aug.

Go to www.multimap.com, then drill down to Black Sturgeon, you can clearly see the lower and upper parts of the lake.Also, Black Sturgeon Camp or the store at Beauty Bay will have something/information.Start with that and if you want further info, post it and I'll see what else I have.Have fun !
